attributes.action: Stop fireworks being sold to the public
attributes.additional_details: Fireworks should be stopped being sold to the public, they are dangerous, they kill animals, people have a fear of fireworks and ex army veterans who have fought for our country shouldn’t have to suffer from hearing the sound of fireworks and it’s not fair on people who have fears of loud bangs or noises, the flashing lights can cause problems with people who are warned for flashing lights
attributes.background: Stop fireworks being sold to the public to protect all animals, ex army veterans with PTSD, anyone with a fear of fireworks

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

You may also wish the sign the following petition:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758
